How can I get involved with the Verus community and learn more about Verus?

You can get involved with the Verus community and learn more about Verus by visiting the official Verus website at https://veruscoin.io, joining the Verus Discord channel at https://discord.gg/VRKMP2S, and exploring the resources available on the website, such as guides and release notes.

What is the Verus Coin Foundation, and what is its vision?

The Verus Coin Foundation is an organization that has been formed to support the development and growth of Verus. Its vision is to focus on creating a PBaaS (Public Blockchain as a Service) ecosystem.
